filmography.title: Up the River
filmography.role_description: A tough convict who befriends a fellow inmate and helps him with a romance in this prison comedy that marked Tracy's feature film debut.
filmography.plot: Two convicts escape prison to help a friend who is being blackmailed, only to return later to finish their sentences.

filmography.title: The Power and the Glory
filmography.role_description: A ruthless railroad tycoon whose rise from humble beginnings to immense power is told through flashbacks after his death.
filmography.plot: The rise of a railroad tycoon is told in flashbacks at his funeral, revealing his ambition and personal failures.

filmography.title: Fury
filmography.role_description: An innocent traveler wrongly accused of kidnapping who survives a lynch mob attack and returns to exact vengeance on the town.
filmography.plot: A man wrongly accused of kidnapping survives a lynch mob attack and plots his revenge by framing the mob leaders for his own 'murder'.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: San Francisco
filmography.role_description: A tough but compassionate priest who tries to guide his childhood friend, a saloon keeper, onto a righteous path.
filmography.plot: A saloon keeper and a priest try to guide the destiny of a beautiful singer in 1906 San Francisco.

filmography.title: Libeled Lady
filmography.role_description: A scheming newspaper editor who concocts a complex plot involving a fake marriage to avoid a massive libel lawsuit.
filmography.plot: A newspaper editor hires a gigolo to compromise an heiress who is suing his paper for libel.

filmography.title: Captains Courageous
filmography.role_description: A kind-hearted Portuguese fisherman who rescues a spoiled rich boy from the ocean and teaches him about hard work and humility.
filmography.plot: A spoiled brat who falls overboard from a steamship in the 1920s gets picked up by a fishing boat, where he's made to earn his keep.

filmography.title: Boys Town
filmography.role_description: The real-life Catholic priest who founded a home for delinquent boys, believing that 'there is no such thing as a bad boy.'
filmography.plot: A priest sets up a school for wayward boys and struggles to save a particularly tough kid from a life of crime.

filmography.title: Test Pilot
filmography.role_description: The loyal mechanic and best friend to a reckless test pilot, constantly worrying about the dangers his friend takes.
filmography.plot: A daredevil test pilot marries a girl he meets on a forced landing, but his job puts a strain on their relationship.

filmography.title: Stanley and Livingstone
filmography.role_description: The determined reporter sent to Africa on a perilous mission to find the missing missionary Dr. Livingstone.
filmography.plot: Newspaper reporter Henry M. Stanley is sent to Africa to find the missing missionary Dr. David Livingstone.

filmography.title: Boom Town
filmography.role_description: An honest wildcatter who partners with a more reckless friend to strike it rich in the oil fields, leading to conflict over business and women.
filmography.plot: Two friends strike oil in Texas, but their partnership is threatened by their rivalry over a woman and business success.

filmography.title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
filmography.role_description: A scientist who experiments with separating good and evil in man, transforming into a sadistic monster.
filmography.plot: Dr. Jekyll allows his dark side to run wild when he drinks a potion that turns him into the evil Mr. Hyde.

filmography.title: Woman of the Year
filmography.role_description: A down-to-earth sportswriter who marries a sophisticated political columnist, leading to a clash of lifestyles and egos.
filmography.plot: Rival reporters Sam and Tess fall in love and get married, only to find their relationship strained when her career takes precedence.

filmography.title: A Guy Named Joe
filmography.role_description: A reckless bomber pilot who dies in action and returns as a guardian angel to guide a young pilot and watch over his former girlfriend.
filmography.plot: A pilot kills himself in a crash and returns as a guardian angel to guide a young pilot through the war and in love.

filmography.title: The Seventh Cross
filmography.role_description: One of seven prisoners who escape from a Nazi concentration camp, desperately trying to evade capture while his comrades are hunted down.
filmography.plot: Seven men escape from a Nazi concentration camp. The commandant erects seven crosses, one for each fugitive to be crucified upon capture.

filmography.title: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo
filmography.role_description: The daring aviation pioneer who plans and leads the first retaliatory air raid on the Japanese mainland during WWII.
filmography.plot: The story of the first American air raid against Japan in 1942, commanded by Lt. Col. James Doolittle.

filmography.title: State of the Union
filmography.role_description: An idealistic industrialist who runs for President, struggling to maintain his integrity against corrupt political handlers.
filmography.plot: An aircraft tycoon runs for President of the United States, but finds he must compromise his ideals to win.

filmography.title: Edward, My Son
filmography.role_description: A wealthy but morally corrupt father who will stop at nothing, including arson and blackmail, to spoil his son.
filmography.plot: A man ruthlessly climbs the ladder of success to provide a luxurious life for his son, destroying everyone around him in the process.

filmography.title: Adam's Rib
filmography.role_description: An assistant district attorney who finds himself prosecuting a woman defended by his own wife, leading to a battle of the sexes.
filmography.plot: Domestic and professional tensions mount when a husband and wife work as opposing lawyers in a case involving a woman who shot her husband.

filmography.title: Father of the Bride
filmography.role_description: A harried suburban father struggling to cope with the emotional and financial stress of his daughter's wedding.
filmography.plot: A father comes to grips with his daughter's upcoming wedding and the chaos that surrounds the planning of the event.

filmography.title: Pat and Mike
filmography.role_description: A rough-around-the-edges sports promoter who takes on a talented female athlete as a client, leading to romance.
filmography.plot: A promoter manages a brilliant female athlete who gets flustered every time her fiancé is around.

filmography.title: The Actress
filmography.role_description: A gruff, ex-seaman father who struggles to understand his daughter's dream of becoming an actress but ultimately supports her.
filmography.plot: A young woman is determined to become an actress, much to the dismay of her father who wants her to attend college.

filmography.title: Bad Day at Black Rock
filmography.role_description: A one-armed war veteran who uncovers a dark secret in a hostile desert town while looking for a Japanese-American farmer.
filmography.plot: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town and uncovers a terrible secret that the citizens will kill to keep.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actor; Cannes: Win – Best Actor

filmography.title: Desk Set
filmography.role_description: A computer expert hired to automate a TV network's research department, who clashes with the head librarian before falling for her.
filmography.plot: Two extremely strong personalities clash over the computerization of a TV network's research department.

filmography.title: The Old Man and the Sea
filmography.role_description: An aging Cuban fisherman who struggles for days to catch a giant marlin, battling the elements and sharks.
filmography.plot: An old Cuban fisherman's dry spell is broken when he hooks a gigantic fish that drags him out to sea.

filmography.title: Inherit the Wind
filmography.role_description: A brilliant defense attorney based on Clarence Darrow who defends a teacher accused of teaching evolution in a religiously conservative town.
filmography.plot: Based on the real-life Scopes 'Monkey' Trial, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a science teacher accused of teaching evolution.

filmography.title: Judgment at Nuremberg
filmography.role_description: An American judge presiding over the trial of Nazi judges in post-war Germany, wrestling with complex questions of guilt and justice.
filmography.plot: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazi judges for war crimes.

filmography.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
filmography.role_description: A liberal newspaper publisher who is challenged when his daughter brings home a Black fiancé, forcing him to confront his own beliefs.
filmography.plot: A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fiancé.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actor (Posthumous); BAFTA: Win – Best Actor
